function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Severe symptomatology more frequent in elderly subjects, people with concomitant pathologies, and young subjects with weak immune systems","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and death","Mitigation":"Vaccination, enhanced protective measures, and early medical intervention","Technologies":"Vaccines, personal protective equipment, and medical monitoring devices","People":"Elderly subjects, people with concomitant pathologies, and young subjects with weak immune systems","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, public health authorities, and individuals"},{"Description":"Decreased immune defense due to excessive workload and irregular circadian sleep-wake rhythm","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infections and severe symptomatology","Mitigation":"Balanced workload, healthy sleep habits, and stress management","Technologies":"Health tracking devices, sleep monitoring tools, and stress management apps","People":"Individuals with excessive workload and irregular sleep-wake rhythm","Owner":"Employers, individuals, and healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Transmissibility and entry of SARS-CoV-2 through access routes such as oral cavity, nasal cavity, eyes, and mucous membranes","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, eye protection, hand hygiene, and environmental disinfection","Technologies":"Face masks, gloves, hand sanitizers, and UV disinfection devices","People":"General population and healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, individuals, and healthcare institutions"}]}
